description: This module provides a variety of linkout functions for different biological databases and resources. It includes plugins for linking out to gene ontology databases, gene annotation portals, cancer genomics portals, mutation databases, genome browsers, and more. Each plugin defines specific linkout functions that open URLs to the respective resources based on provided identifiers or names.

global_variables.name: iQueryBaseURL
global_variables.description: Base URL for NDEx IQuery linkouts.

functions.name: openAmigo
functions.description: Opens a URL in the Gene Ontology Amigo website for a given GO term ID.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array where the first element is the GO term ID to be used in the URL.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser using the linkouts.openUrl function.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: searchBioGPS
functions.description: This function searches for a given gene name on the BioGPS website and opens the search results in a new window.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of gene names, where the first element is used for the search query.

side_effects: Opens a new window with the BioGPS search results.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openSlideArchive
functions.description: Opens a specific slide archive in the Cancer Digital Slide Archive by constructing a URL using the first 12 characters of the first ID in the provided list and forcing the browser to reload the page.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: An array of IDs where the first ID is used to construct the URL.

side_effects: Forces the browser to reload the page.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openCBIOGenes
functions.description: This function constructs a URL to the cBioPortal results page for a given list of genes and opens it in a new frame. It uses the study ID from the linkouts attribute to form the URL.

parameters.name: genes
parameters.description: An array of gene names to be queried in the cBioPortal.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in a frame.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openCBIOSamp
functions.description: Opens a cBioPortal case URL for a given study and case ID.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: An array containing case IDs. The first element of the array is used to construct the URL.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openCBIOSampTCGA
functions.description: This function extracts the first 12 characters from the first element of the input array and calls the openCBIOSamp function with the extracted substring wrapped in an array.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: An array of strings from which the first element's first 12 characters will be extracted.

side_effects: Calls the openCBIOSamp function with a modified array.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openCivicDB
functions.description: Opens the CivicDB website with the provided Entrez ID.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: An array containing Entrez IDs. The first ID in the array is used to construct the URL.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openCosmicGene
functions.description: Opens the COSMIC gene analysis page for the given gene name in a new browser tab or window.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of gene names, where the first element is the gene name to be used in the URL.

side_effects: Opens a new browser tab or window with the COSMIC gene analysis page.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openDecipher
functions.description: Opens a URL in the Decipher database for the given gene name.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of gene names, where the first element is used to construct the URL.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser using the linkouts.openUrl method.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openDepMap
functions.description: Opens the DepMap portal for a given gene ID in a new browser tab.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: An array containing gene IDs. The first element of the array is used to construct the URL.

side_effects: Opens a new browser tab with the DepMap portal for the specified gene ID.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: searchEnsemblForGene
functions.description: This function searches for a gene in the Ensembl database using the provided gene names. It constructs a URL based on the first gene name in the list and the species attribute, then opens this URL in the Ensembl website.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of gene names, where the first element is used for the search query.

side_effects: Opens a URL in the Ensembl website.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: searchEnsemblForTranscript
functions.description: Searches the Ensembl database for a transcript using the provided names array. It constructs a URL based on the species and the first name in the array, then opens this URL in the Ensembl website.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of transcript names to search for. The first element of the array is used in the search query.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the Ensembl website.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openFireBrowseGene
functions.description: Opens a FireBrowse webpage for a given gene name. The function constructs a URL using the first gene name provided in the 'names' array and opens it in a new browser tab or window.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of gene names, where the first element is used to construct the FireBrowse URL.

side_effects: Opens a new browser tab or window with the constructed FireBrowse URL.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openGdcGene
functions.description: Opens the GDC (Genomic Data Commons) portal for a specific gene using the provided label.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: An array containing gene labels, where the first element is used to construct the URL.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser using the linkouts.openUrl function.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openGdcCase
functions.description: Opens a GDC (Genomic Data Commons) case in a new browser tab using the provided case label.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: An array containing case labels. The first element is used to construct the URL.

side_effects: Opens a new browser tab with the specified GDC case URL.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: searchGeneCards
functions.description: This function searches for a gene in the GeneCards database using the first label provided in the labels array.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: An array of strings where the first element is the gene keyword to search for in GeneCards.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser to perform the search on GeneCards.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openGenevisiblePeptide
functions.description: Opens a URL in the GeneVisible website for the given gene name.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of gene names, where the first element is used to construct the URL.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser using the linkouts.openUrl function.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openGenevisibleHugo
functions.description: Opens a GeneVisible webpage for the first gene name provided in the input array.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of gene names, where the first element is used to construct the URL.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser using the linkouts.openUrl function.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: searchGoogle
functions.description: This function performs a Google search using the provided selection of keywords. It constructs a search URL and opens it in a new frame.

parameters.name: selection
parameters.description: An array of strings representing the keywords to search for on Google.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in a frame using the linkouts.openUrl method.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: searchGoogleScholar
functions.description: This function constructs a Google Scholar search URL using the provided labels and opens it in a new browser window.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: An array of strings representing the search terms to be used in the Google Scholar query.

side_effects: Opens a new browser window with the constructed Google Scholar search URL.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openGTExPortal
functions.description: Opens the GTEx Portal for the given gene ID in a new frame.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: An array containing gene IDs to be used in the URL for the GTEx Portal.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in a frame.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openHGNCGene
functions.description: Opens the HGNC gene symbol report page for the first gene name provided in the input array.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of gene names, where the first element is used to generate the URL.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser using the linkouts.openUrl function.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: viewIdeogramGene
functions.description: Opens the Ideogram viewer with a specified list of genes.

parameters.name: genes
parameters.description: An array of gene names to be visualized in the Ideogram viewer.

side_effects: Opens a new browser window or tab with the Ideogram viewer.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: viewIdeogramGene2
functions.description: This function constructs a URL to the Ideogram Viewer with two lists of genes and opens it in a new window.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: An object containing two arrays of gene labels: 'Row' and 'Column'.

side_effects: Opens a new browser window with the constructed URL.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: viewIdeogramMIRNA
functions.description: This function processes a list of miRNA identifiers by removing the '.MIMAT' suffix from each identifier and then opens a URL to the Ideogram Viewer with the processed list of miRNA identifiers as a query parameter.

parameters.name: mir
parameters.description: An array of miRNA identifiers.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the 'ideogram' window.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: viewIdeogramMIRNA2
functions.description: This function processes miRNA labels from the input object and constructs a URL to open an ideogram viewer with the processed miRNA lists.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: An object containing 'Row' and 'Column' arrays of miRNA labels.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the 'ideogram' window.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openLinkedOmicsGene
functions.description: Opens the LinkedOmics gene page for the first gene name provided in the input array.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of gene names, where the first element is used to construct the URL.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser using the linkouts.openUrl method.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openLinkedOmicsIsoform
functions.description: Opens a LinkedOmics isoform page for a given protein name in a new browser tab or window.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array where the first element is the protein name to be used in the URL.

side_effects: Opens a new browser tab or window with the LinkedOmics isoform page for the specified protein name.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openMavedbGene
functions.description: Opens a URL to the MaveDB Variant Effects Database with a search query for a specific gene name and species.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array containing gene names, where the first element is used for the search query.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: viewMiRBasePage
functions.description: This function takes an array of entity IDs, extracts the miRNA ID from the first element, and opens a URL to the miRBase website for that specific miRNA.

parameters.name: eids
parameters.description: An array of entity IDs, where the first element contains the miRNA ID.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser using the linkouts.openUrl method.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openMSigDB
functions.description: Opens a URL to the MSigDB (Molecular Signatures Database) card for a given pathway name.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of pathway names, where the first element is used to construct the URL.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: viewMupitG
functions.description: This function sorts and filters a list of gene names to remove duplicates, then opens a URL to the MuPIT Interactive tool for the first gene in the list.

parameters.name: genes
parameters.description: An array of gene names to be processed and used to generate the MuPIT URL.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser using the linkouts.openUrl function.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openMW
functions.description: Opens the Metabolomics Workbench search page for the given name.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of names to search for. The first element is used in the search query.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openRegno
functions.description: Opens a URL in a new window/tab based on the provided registration number (RegNo) from the names array. If the registration number is empty, it alerts the user that no RegNo is available.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array where the first element is expected to be the registration number (RegNo) of a metabolite.

side_effects: Displays an alert if the registration number is empty.
Opens a new URL in a new window/tab using the linkouts.openUrl method.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openPubchem
functions.description: Opens a PubChem URL for the given metabolite ID. If the ID is not available, it alerts the user.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array where the first element is the PubChem ID of the metabolite.

side_effects: Displays an alert if no PubChem ID is available.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openRefmet
functions.description: Opens a URL in the Metabolomics Workbench site for the given reference metabolite name.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of strings where the first element is the reference metabolite name to search for.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openHMDB
functions.description: Opens the Human Metabolome Database (HMDB) webpage for a given metabolite name. If the name is empty, it alerts the user that no HMDB ID is available.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of metabolite names, where the first element is used to construct the HMDB URL.

side_effects: Displays an alert if the first element of the names array is an empty string.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openKEGG
functions.description: Opens a KEGG database URL for the given metabolite name. If the name is empty, it alerts the user that no KEGG ID is available.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of metabolite names, where the first element is used to construct the KEGG URL.

side_effects: Displays an alert if the first element of the names array is an empty string.
Opens a new URL using the linkouts.openUrl function.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openChebi
functions.description: Opens a ChEBI (Chemical Entities of Biological Interest) webpage for the given metabolite name. If the name is empty, it alerts the user that no ChEBI name is available.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of metabolite names, where the first element is used to construct the ChEBI URL.

side_effects: Displays an alert if the first element of the names array is an empty string.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openMetacyc
functions.description: Opens a MetaCyc URL for a given metabolite name. If the name is empty, it alerts the user that no MetaCyc name is available.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array containing metabolite names, where the first element is the MetaCyc name.

side_effects: Displays an alert if the MetaCyc name is empty.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openClinVar
functions.description: Opens the ClinVar webpage for the specified gene name.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of gene names, where the first element is used to construct the ClinVar URL.

side_effects: Opens a new browser tab or window with the ClinVar webpage for the specified gene.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openNCBIGenePage
functions.description: Opens the NCBI gene page for a given gene name and species. If the species is not specified, it defaults to 'Homo_sapiens'.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of gene names, where the first element is used to construct the URL.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openNCBIEntrezIDPage
functions.description: Opens the NCBI Gene page for the first Entrez ID in the provided array.

parameters.name: eids
parameters.description: An array of Entrez IDs, where the first ID will be used to construct the URL.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser using the linkouts.openUrl method.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: searchNCBIDatabases
functions.description: This function constructs a URL to search the NCBI databases for a given gene name and species, and then opens this URL in a new window or tab.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of gene names, where the first element is used for the search query.

side_effects: Opens a new window or tab with the constructed NCBI search URL.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openGEOAccession
functions.description: Opens a URL to the NCBI GEO database for the given accession ID.

parameters.name: aids
parameters.description: An array of accession IDs, where the first ID in the array will be used to construct the URL.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: searchClinicalTrialsForOne
functions.description: This function searches for clinical trials related to the first label in the provided array by opening a URL to the ClinicalTrials.gov website with the search term.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: An array of strings where the first element is used as the search term for clinical trials.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: searchClinicalTrials
functions.description: This function constructs a search query from an array of labels and opens a URL to search for clinical trials on clinicaltrials.gov using the constructed query.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: An array of strings representing the labels to be included in the search query.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser to perform the search on clinicaltrials.gov.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: iQuery
functions.description: This function constructs a URL using the provided names and opens it in a new window or tab labeled 'NDEx IQuery'. It is used for linking out GEO Accession identifiers to the NDEx IQuery plugin.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of GEO Accession identifiers to be included in the URL.

side_effects: Opens a new browser window or tab with the constructed URL.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: iQuery2
functions.description: This function concatenates the Row and Column properties of the input labels object, removes duplicate values, and then calls the iQuery function with the resulting array.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: An object containing Row and Column properties, both of which are arrays of labels.

side_effects: Calls the iQuery function with a unique array of concatenated Row and Column labels.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openOLSVis
functions.description: Opens a URL in the OLSVis plugin using the first element of the provided names array.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of names where the first element is used to construct the URL.

side_effects: Opens a URL in a new window or tab using the linkouts.openUrl function.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openMDACCPathwayID
functions.description: Opens the MD Anderson Pathway Database for the given gene name.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of gene names, where the first element is used to construct the URL.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser using the linkouts.openUrl function.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openPathwaysBrowserGO
functions.description: Opens the Pathways Browser for a given Gene Ontology (GO) term using the provided GO ID.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array where the first element is the GO ID to be used for opening the Pathways Browser.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser using the provided GO ID.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openPeptideAtlas
functions.description: Opens the PeptideAtlas search page for the first name in the provided array of names.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of names where the first element is used to search in PeptideAtlas.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser using the linkouts.openUrl function.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: searchPubMedForOne
functions.description: This function searches PubMed for a given label by opening a URL with the search term in the default web browser.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: An array of search terms. The function uses the first element of this array to perform the search.

side_effects: Opens a URL in the default web browser.

returns.description: This function does not return any value.

functions.name: searchPubMedForAll
functions.description: This function constructs a PubMed search URL using the provided labels and opens it in a new window or tab.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: An array of strings representing the search terms to be combined with 'AND' for the PubMed search.

side_effects: Opens a new window or tab with the constructed PubMed search URL.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: searchPubMedForAny
functions.description: This function constructs a PubMed search URL using the provided labels and opens it in a new window or tab.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: An array of strings representing the search terms to be used in the PubMed search query.

side_effects: Opens a new window or tab with the constructed PubMed search URL.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openQuickGO
functions.description: Opens the QuickGO webpage for the given Gene Ontology (GO) term ID.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array containing GO term IDs, where the first element is used to construct the URL.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser using the linkouts.openUrl function.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: searchAntibodyRegistry
functions.description: This function searches the Antibody Registry for a given label by opening a URL with the search query.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: An array of labels to search for in the Antibody Registry. Only the first label in the array is used.

side_effects: Opens a URL in the browser to perform the search.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: searchSCICrunch
functions.description: This function constructs a URL to search for antibodies on the SCICrunch website using the first label in the provided labels array and opens this URL in a new browser tab.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: An array of strings where the first element is used as the search query for SCICrunch.

side_effects: Opens a new browser tab with the constructed SCICrunch search URL.

returns.description: This function does not return any value.

functions.name: expandLinkOuts
functions.description: Expands the TCGA fields to allow any TCGA type longer than typeName to be used as a subtype for any function expecting a supertype.
side_effects: Modifies the linkouts object by adding subtypes to it.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openTumorPortalGene
functions.description: Opens a URL to the TumorPortal website for a given gene symbol.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of gene names, where the first element is used to construct the URL.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser using the linkouts.openUrl function.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openUCSC
functions.description: Opens the UCSC Genome Browser at a specified genomic position.

parameters.name: posns
parameters.description: An array of genomic positions to be viewed in the UCSC Genome Browser. The first position in the array is used.

side_effects: Opens a URL in the UCSC Genome Browser with the specified genomic position.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: openUniprot
functions.description: This function opens a Uniprot webpage for a given gene name. It constructs the URL using the first element of the provided names array and opens it using the linkouts.openUrl method.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of gene names, where the first element is used to construct the Uniprot URL.

side_effects: Opens a new URL in the browser using linkouts.openUrl.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.

functions.name: searchVega
functions.description: This function searches for a given gene name on the Vega genome browser website. It constructs a URL using the provided gene name and species, and then opens this URL in a new window or tab.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: An array of gene names, where the first element is used for the search.

side_effects: Opens a new window or tab with the constructed URL.

returns.description: This function does not return a value.
